question: A square loop of side 2m lies in the Y-Z plane in a region having a magnetic field <katex>$\overline{B} = (5\hat{i} + 3\hat{j} - 4\hat{k})$</katex> T. The magnitude of magnetic flux through the square loop is
explanation: Area vector <katex>$\overline{A} = (2 \times 2) \hat{i} = 4\hat{i}$</katex> (as loop is in y-z plane). [cite: 581, 582, 583]
